title: Tutorial
code: # Load the pipe operator `%>%` <- magrittr::`%>%`  # Get yearly salary and bonus for each row in tvl_salaries_monthly (test 3 only) salary_bonus <- tv::get_yearly_salary_and_bonus(   data = tvl_salaries_monthly[1:3, ] ) #> [1] "https://oeffentlicher-dienst.info/c/t/rechner/tv-l/west/2008?id=tv-l-2008&g=E_1&s=1" #> [1] "https://oeffentlicher-dienst.info/c/t/rechner/tv-l/west/2008?id=tv-l-2008&g=E_1&s=2" #> [1] "https://oeffentlicher-dienst.info/c/t/rechner/tv-l/west/2008?id=tv-l-2008&g=E_1&s=3"  # Save salary_bonus in rds file #kwb.utils::createDirectory("./inst/extdata") #saveRDS(salary_bonus, "./inst/extdata/yearly-salary-and-bonus.rds") #salary_bonus <- readRDS("./inst/extdata/yearly-salary-and-bonus.rds")    salary_bonus$percentage <- round(   salary_bonus$extra_yearly / salary_bonus$salary_yearly * 100,    digits = 2L )  DT::datatable(salary_bonus) bonus_summary <- salary_bonus %>%   dplyr::group_by(union_rate, area, pay_group) %>%   dplyr::summarise(     min_percentage = min(percentage, na.rm = TRUE),     max_percentage = max(percentage, na.rm = TRUE),      .groups = "drop"   )  DT::datatable(bonus_summary)

title: R Package for TV (Tarifvertrag)
text: installing latest release R package run following code :
code: # Enable repository from mrustl options(repos = c(   mrustl = 'https://mrustl.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))    # Download and install 'tv' in R install.packages('tv')  # Browse the 'tv' manual pages help(package = 'tv')

title: Get Salaries — get_salaries
code: get_salaries(   years = 2008:2021,   union_rate = "tv-l",   area = "west",   resolution = "monthly",   dbg = TRUE )

title: Get Salaries — get_salaries
text: years years tariffs try download (default: 2008:2021) union_rate default: "tv-l" area default: "west" resolution "monthly": Monatswerte, "annual": Jahreswerte, "quarterly": Quartalswerte, "weekly": Wochenwerte, "weekdays": werktagswerte, "daily": Tageswerte. Default: "monthly" dbg print debug messages (default: TRUE)

title: Get Salaries — get_salaries

title: Get Salary — get_salary
text: year year tariff (default: 2009) union_rate default: "tv-l" area default: "west" resolution "monthly": Monatswerte, "annual": Jahreswerte, "quarterly": Quartalswerte, "weekly": Wochenwerte, "weekdays": werktagswerte, "daily": Tageswerte. Default: "monthly"

title: Get Salary — get_salary

what: Get Yearly Salary and Bonus — get_yearly_salary_and_bonus
title: Get Yearly Salary and Bonus — get_yearly_salary_and_bonus
Get Yearly Salary and Bonus — get_yearly_salary_and_bonus
code: get_yearly_salary_and_bonus(   union_rate,   area,   year,   pay_group,   step,   data = NULL )

title: Get Yearly Salary and Bonus — get_yearly_salary_and_bonus
text: union_rate default: "tv-l" area default: "west" year year tariff (default: 2009) data optional. Data frame columns "union_rate", "area", "year", "pay_group", "step". given, function called row data frame

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.
